title: Add company logo and contact details

requirements.summary: Display the Shasvanth Tours & Travels logo prominently in the website header and app navigation
acceptanceCriteria: Logo is visible in the header/navigation area
Logo maintains its aspect ratio and quality
Logo is clickable and navigates to home page

file_operations.description: Create a Header component that displays the Shasvanth Tours & Travels logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/shasvanth-logo.dim_800x300.png. The logo should be clickable and navigate to the home page, maintain its aspect ratio, and be styled appropriately for the header area.
Import and integrate the Header component at the top of the application layout so the logo appears on all pages.

requirements.summary: Display contact phone number 6382281842 in the website footer and app contact section
acceptanceCriteria: Phone number is displayed with appropriate formatting
Phone number is clickable and initiates a call on mobile devices

file_operations.description: Create a Footer component that displays the contact phone number 6382281842 with appropriate formatting (e.g., +91 6382281842). Use a tel: link to make it clickable and enable calling on mobile devices.
Import and integrate the Footer component at the bottom of the application layout so contact information appears on all pages.

requirements.summary: Display contact email shasvanthtoursandtravels@gmail.com in the website footer and app contact section
acceptanceCriteria: Email address is clickable and opens default email client

file_operations.description: Add the email address shasvanthtoursandtravels@gmail.com to the Footer component. Use a mailto: link to make it clickable and open the default email client when clicked.

requirements.summary: Render the generated logo image as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Logo image is stored in the correct directory
Logo is properly imported and displayed in components

file_operations.description: Ensure the Header component correctly references the generated logo image at frontend/public/assets/generated/shasvanth-logo.dim_800x300.png using the appropriate asset path for the build system (e.g., /assets/generated/shasvanth-logo.dim_800x300.png).
